name: Korn
description: This game is a project created by four students, one of whom is myself, to pay tribute to a deceased classmate. In this game you play as Korn a robot who wakes up after hundreds of years awakened by a small being of this planet. At the beginning of the game your goal is to open the magic door through a stele which is triggered by an orb hidden in the level. I hope you will like the game, it was made in 6 weeks. The game is still in development and we are still working on it, so some bugs may be apparent during your experience.
